title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Education) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister education) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Gary Woods, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Gary Woods, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Education, Marlborough Street, Dublin 1, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Education with effect from 
27 October 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [707] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
